chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> lazy_power A egalite f x n = power (Map A) f x n

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
lazy_power : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A -> bool) -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> Map A
power : forall A : Set, (A -> A) -> A -> nat -> A
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments
lazy_power_eg_power_0 : forall (A : Set) (egalite : Map A -> Map A -> bool) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), (forall a b : Map A, egalite a b = true <-> a = b) -> forall z : Map A, (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_true A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n /\ z = f z) /\ (lazy_power_aux A egalite f x n = flag_false A z -> z = power (Map A) f x n)
MapFlag_sum : forall (A : Set) (f : MapFlag A), exists x : Map A, f = flag_true A x \/ f = flag_false A x
lazy_power_aux : forall A : Set, (Map A -> Map A -> bool) -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> nat -> MapFlag A
MapCollect_as_Fold : forall (A B : Type) (f : ad -> A -> Map B) (m : Map A), MapCollect A B f m = MapFold A (Map B) (M0 B) (MapMerge B) f m
dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (single A x)) -> (forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> P (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, dist_chain A p -> P p
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
fix_point : forall A : Set, mEnsemble A -> (Map A -> Map A) -> Map A -> Prop
MapCard_Put_sum : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (n n' : nat), m' = MapPut A m a y -> n = MapCard A m -> n' = MapCard A m' -> {n' = n} + {n' = S n}
MapCard_Put_behind_sum : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y : A) (n n' : nat), m' = MapPut_behind A m a y -> n = MapCard A m -> n' = MapCard A m' -> {n' = n} + {n' = S n}
MapCard_Remove_sum : forall (A : Type) (m m' : Map A) (a : ad) (n n' : nat), m' = MapRemove A m a -> n = MapCard A m -> n' = MapCard A m' -> {n = n'} + {n = S n'}
map_sum : forall (A : Set) (m : Map A), m = M0 A \/ (exists (a : ad) (x : A), m = M1 A a x) \/ (exists x y : Map A, m = M2 A x y)
dist_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y)
dist_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y)
VectorEq.eqb_eq : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), VectorEq.eqb A A_beq v1 v2 = true < -> v1 = v2
Inductive dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := dist_single : forall x : Map A, dist_chain A (single A x) | dist_concat_s : forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y) | dist_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For dist_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = true <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : VectorDef.t A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_imp_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q
makeM2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
MapDelta : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
MapMerge : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
andb_prop : forall a b : bool, a && b = true -> a = true /\ b = true
PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_iff_PredExt : (forall A B : Prop, A <-> B -> A = B) /\ (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x = Q x) -> P = Q) < -> (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q)
MapPut : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
MapPut_behind : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
PropExtensionalityFacts.PredExt_imp_PropExt : (forall (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, P x <-> Q x) -> P = Q) -> forall A B : Prop, A < -> B -> A = B
MapDomRestrTo : forall A B : Type, Map A -> Map B -> Map A
MapDomRestrBy : forall A B : Type, Map A -> Map B -> Map A
MapCollect : forall A B : Type, (ad -> A -> Map B) -> Map A -> Map B
